channel.title: Writing on deadfast
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on deadfast

item.title: markdown
item.author: deadfast@proton.io (deadfast)
item.description: Naming standards should be pretty important, file names may potentially be relevant but taking time to create good naming will be very useful as your obsidian notes continue expanding. This is also true when it comes to creating heading and code blocks to reference, it’ll be important to continue mastering markdown as a typing “language” Note most of this stuff is stolen from my obsidian note so mileage will very.
